attributes.action: To only allow silent fireworks to be used in the Uk and only at public displays.
attributes.additional_details: After five weeks of continuous fireworks going off every single night in the Havering area. I would like the government to really consider the only fireworks that can be used in the UK and only by licensed organiser of public displays are silent fireworks.
attributes.background: To put a law in place that only silent fireworks can be used in the UK and only by licenced organised displays and none to be sold to the general public.
